entities.name: F-715A
entities.description: Left unit of the F-715 A & B particulate filter separators (parallel pair). Identified tag F-715A on the vessel shell.

entities.name: F-715B
entities.description: Right unit of the F-715 A & B particulate filter separators (parallel pair). Identified tag F-715B on the vessel shell.

entities.name: V-710
entities.description: Slug catcher shown as source feeding the F-715A/B inlet (label on left edge 'FROM SLUG CATCHER V-710').

entities.name: V-720 (Surge drum)
entities.description: Surge drum referenced on right-side piping header ('TO SURGE DRUM V-720'). Appears to be a destination for the filter outlet header.

entities.name: V-005 (Closed drain tank)
entities.description: Closed drain tank shown as a destination on the top header ('TO CLOSED DRAIN TANK V-005').

entities.name: V-73D (Condensate 2-phase separator)
entities.description: Label on right-side branch reads 'TO CONDENSATE 2 PHASE SEPARATOR V-73D' (OCR uncertain on the digit/letter; likely V-730 or V-73D). Marked as a condensate separator destination from the header.

entities.name: MV-715-01
entities.description: 6" outlet isolation valve on F-715B connecting to common header (6"-D2R)

entities.name: Interconnect (A-B)
entities.description: 6" crossover between F-715A and F-715B with isolation valves on each side (cloud label shown).

entities.name: MV-715-06B
entities.description: Isolation valve on the interconnect side near F-715B

entities.name: Filter common header (to exports)
entities.description: Common outlet header collecting from F-715A/B and routing to export lines (surge drum, closed drain tank, condensate separator).

relations.description: Flow from slug catcher V-710 into F-715A (inlet header splits to both filters).
Flow from slug catcher V-710 into F-715B (inlet header splits to both filters).
Outlet/header from F-715A connects to surge drum V-720 (6" line).
Outlet/header from F-715B connects to surge drum V-720 (6" line).
Top header from filters has branch to closed drain tank V-005 (visible on right-side header).
Filter/header has a branch labeled 'TO CONDENSATE 2 PHASE SEPARATOR V-73D' (destination uncertain, transcribed as V-73D).
PSV 715A mounted on F-715A relief nozzle
PSV 715B mounted on F-715B relief nozzle
Relief discharge valve immediately downstream of PSV 715A, 1"-D2S
Relief discharge valve immediately downstream of PSV 715B, 1"-D2S
6" outlet isolation valve on F-715A to common header
6" outlet isolation valve on F-715B to common header
Interconnect spool between A and B connects to F-715A
Interconnect spool between A and B connects to F-715B
Pressure indicator PI 715A taps vessel side
Pressure indicator PI 715B taps vessel side
Differential pressure indicator DPI 715A connected to F-715A (inlet/outlet DP)
Differential pressure indicator DPI 715B connected to F-715B (inlet/outlet DP)
Common header collects flow from F-715A via MV-715-02A (6"-D2R)
Common header collects flow from F-715B via MV-715-01 (6"-D2R)
Header contains branch labeled '1"-RV-6119-A TO CLOSED DRAIN TANK V-005' (closed drain export) with MV-715-11 on header
Header contains export to SURGE DRUM V-720 via '6"-PL-2240-D' and a valve MV-720-01 shown on the export line
Header contains export to CONDENSATE 2-PHASE SEPARATOR V-73D (label visible on drawing export lines at top-right)

notes: Extracted the two primary vessels F-715A and F-715B and their key design/operating parameters from the title block: size 18" O.D. x 42.5" T/T; Operating 230 PSIG; Design 275 PSIG @ 100F; MDMT -20F @ 275 PSIG; Design capacity 180 GPM @ 2.25 PSID clean. PSV relief setpoints near each vessel read 275 PSIG.

High-level connections captured: inlet from slug catcher V-710; outlets/branches to surge drum V-720, closed drain tank V-005, and a condensate 2-phase separator labeled 'V-73D' (OCR uncertain — likely V-730 or V-73D).
Confidence reduced where text was small/ambiguous (noted above). No small valves/instruments were extracted beyond relief setpoints which are clearly tied to the vessels.
PSV setpoints explicitly shown: PSV 715A and PSV 715B set @ 275 PSIG (extracted from nearby text).
Instrument tap sizes: instrument lines shown as 1/2"-D2S and 1"-D2S for DPI/PI connections; relief lines are 1"-D2S.
Main outlet lines from vessels are 6" nominal (6"-D2R) to a common header; header exports to V-005 (closed drain), V-720 (surge drum), and V-73D (condensate 2-phase separator).
Where valve tags or small text were partially obscured, confidence is reduced and the tag/size was transcribed conservatively as shown on drawing.
Merged extraction: step1 major components + step2 detailed components.

entities.name: V-745
entities.description: NGL Stabilizer (vertical stabilizer tower). Shown with internal trays/mesh pad and multiple nozzles.

entities.name: P-745
entities.description: Submersible sump pump (pad/sump mounted). Shown with motor and HOA control.

entities.name: E-745
entities.description: Stabilizer reboiler (E-745) — referenced on piping lines as stabilizer reboiler and reboiled vapor source/sink. Reboiler is off-page but clearly connected by feed/vapor lines.

measurements.raw_text: Reboiler feed and reboiled vapor lines shown (feed to E-745 and reboiled vapor from E-745)

entities.name: VRU-785
entities.description: Vapor Recovery Unit (referenced as destination for a V-745 overhead/vapor line). Off-page reference (connection shown by pipeline arrow).

entities.name: NGL Heat Recovery Exchanger
entities.description: NGL heat recovery exchanger (warm feed referenced into piping feeding the stabilizer). Off-page but shown as 'FROM NGL HEAT RECOVERY EXCHANGER WARM FEED'.

entities.name: 4"-PG-0532-A
entities.description: 4" process gas line to Vapor Recovery Unit VRU-785. Label: TO VAPOR RECOVERY UNIT VRU-785.

bbox.label: Right-side lines to VRU and E-745 with line IDs and valves

entities.name: 4"-PL-2243-B
entities.description: 4" pipeline FROM NGL HEAT RECOVERY EXCHANGER WARM FEED (to V-745).

entities.name: 4"-PL-2242-B
entities.description: 4" pipeline FROM NGL COOL FEED (to V-745).

entities.name: 6"-PG-0544-B-2"H
entities.description: 6" reboiled NGL vapor from stabilizer reboiler E-745 (label indicates 2" H splice).

entities.name: 4"-PL-2249-B-1 1/2"H
entities.description: 4" reboiler feed to stabilizer reboiler E-745 (label shows 1 1/2" H spool).

entities.name: MV-745-22
entities.description: 4" valve (tag MV-745-22) on top-right horizontal line from V-745 (marked 4"-B2R).

entities.name: MV-745-07
entities.description: Inline valve tagged MV-745-07 (4"-A2R) on mid horizontal line to the right of V-745.

entities.name: MV-745-08
entities.description: Small valve on mid-right line (tag shown near '1"-D2S'). Associated with the line to VRU-785.

bbox.label: Right-side lines to VRU and E-745 with line IDs and valves

entities.name: PSV-745-151
entities.description: Pressure safety valve located at top-right of V-745. Marked 'PSV 745-151' set at 300 PSIG.

entities.name: PI-745-15
entities.description: Pressure indicator (PI) on top/upper connection of V-745 (tag PI 745-15).

entities.name: PIT-745-15
entities.description: Pressure transmitter (PIT) paired with PI-745-15 (tag PIT 745-15).

entities.name: DPIT-745-145
entities.description: Differential pressure transmitter (DPIT) associated with a 5-valve manifold on the vessel (left-side mid elevation).

entities.name: DPIT-745-135
entities.description: Differential pressure transmitter (DPIT) associated with a 5-valve manifold on the vessel (left-side lower elevation).

entities.name: 5-valve manifold (top)
entities.description: 5-valve manifold for DP/level taps connected to vessel V-745. Individual piping taps use 1/2"-D6S lines to manifold. Connected valve tags: MV-745-32 (top), MV-745-33 (mid), MV-745-35 (lower), MV-745-36 (lowest).

entities.name: MV-745-32
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve feeding top 5-valve manifold (tag on left-side connection).

entities.name: MV-745-33
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve (tag MV-745-33) feeding middle 5-valve manifold.

entities.name: MV-745-35
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve (tag MV-745-35) feeding lower 5-valve manifold.

entities.name: MV-745-36
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve (tag MV-745-36) feeding lowest 5-valve manifold.

entities.name: HOA-745
entities.description: Hand-Off-Auto selector near pump P-745 (HOA 745).

entities.name: MV-745-59
entities.description: 2" isolation valve on pump P-745 drain/spill line (tag MV-745-59 shown upstream of drain header).

entities.name: MV-745-58
entities.description: 2" valve (tag MV-745-58) in pump drain/heat-traced line to closed drain header.

entities.name: TT-745-151
entities.description: Temperature transmitter (TT 745-151) shown near pump/top instrumentation stack.

entities.name: TW-745-151
entities.description: Temperature well or temperature element (TW 745-151) paired with TT-745-151 at pump/top area.

entities.name: Column of level/temperature instruments (pump area)
entities.description: Stack of instruments at pump area: TSH 745, TAH 745, LSH 745, LAH 745, LSCH 745, LSCL 745 (level/temperature/alarm sensors).

entities.name: Insulated HOT spool (2" HOT)
entities.description: Short insulated spool labeled '1" HOT' / '2" DC-3202-A-1"H-E-HT' connected to P-745 drainage to closed drain header.

entities.name: To closed drain header 10-0610
entities.description: Closed drain header destination for P-745 drain line (tagged TO CLOSED DRAIN HEADER 10-0610).

relations.description: V-745 overhead/vapor line connects to Vapor Recovery Unit VRU-785 via 4"-PG-0532-A (arrow shown on drawing).
V-745 provides reboiler feed to Stabilizer Reboiler E-745 (line labeled 'REBOILER FEED TO STABILIZER REBOILER E-745').
Reboiled NGL vapor from Stabilizer Reboiler E-745 is shown on a return/connection line (labeled 'REBOILED NGL VAPOR FROM STABILIZER REBOILER E-745').
Warm feed from NGL Heat Recovery Exchanger flows to V-745 (label 'FROM NGL HEAT RECOVERY EXCHANGER WARM FEED').
V-745 connects to 4"-PG-0532-A leading to VRU-785.
4"-PG-0532-A goes to Vapor Recovery Unit VRU-785 (line label on drawing).
4"-PL-2243-B is labeled 'FROM NGL HEAT RECOVERY EXCHANGER WARM FEED' and feeds V-745.
Heat exchanger supplies warm feed on 4"-PL-2243-B to V-745.
4"-PL-2242-B labeled 'FROM NGL COOL FEED' connects to V-745.
E-745 supplies reboiled NGL vapor via 6"-PG-0544-B-2"H to V-745.
V-745 sends reboiler feed via 4"-PL-2249-B (reboiler feed to E-745).
Valve MV-745-22 located on a 4" outlet at top-right of V-745.
Valve MV-745-07 located on mid horizontal outlet from V-745.
PSV-745-151 installed on V-745 (setpoint noted on drawing).
Pressure indicator PI-745-15 on V-745 (top connection).
Pressure transmitter PIT-745-15 associated with PI-745-15 on V-745.
Multiple 5-valve manifolds tap vessel at different elevations via 1/2" lines for level/DP measurements (manifold valves MV-745-32/33/35/36).
Top manifold isolation valve MV-745-32 (1/2"-D6S).
P-745 drain line contains MV-745-59 (2" D25) upstream toward closed drain header.
P-745 drain/heat-traced line includes MV-745-58 (2"-D5S) before header.
P-745 is provided with HOA selector 'HOA 745' local to the pump.
MV-745-08 is shown on the mid-right line near the VRU-785 connection (1"-D2S valve symbol adjacent to 4"-PG-0532-A).
TT-745-151 measures temperature in the pump/top area (stacked with TW-745-151).

notes: Extracted major components only: vessel V-745 (NGL stabilizer) and sump pump P-745 are present on this page. Reboiler E-745, VRU-785 and NGL heat recovery exchanger are referenced by piping arrows (off-page connections) and are included as referenced major components.
Instrument and small valve details were omitted per step instructions except where they provided pressure/safety info clearly tied to a major component (PSV set on V-745 included).
Extraction focused on page 2 (PID) — captured major anchors exactly as provided.
PSV setpoint (300 PSIG) read from drawing near PSV-745-151.
Several instrument manifold valves (MV-745-32, -33, -35, -36) were identified feeding DP/level instruments on V-745.
Left-sump pump P-745 drain piping includes insulated heat-traced spool and two isolation valves MV-745-59 and MV-745-58 to closed drain header 10-0610.
Merged extraction: step1 major components + step2 detailed components.

entities.name: AC-746
entities.description: After cooler unit with fan and motor (VFD noted as 'VFD BY OTHERS'). Primary tag visible as AC-746. Associated local control/instrumentation indicated (TIC/TIT/TW set) and a temperature control setpoint.

entities.name: E-742
entities.description: Heat recovery exchanger bank shown with twin horizontal shells/tubes. Primary tag visible as E-742. Insulation callout '2" THK. HOT INSULATION' present on exchanger shells.

entities.name: 4"-PL-2242-B
entities.description: 4" process line to NGL stabilizer - labelled '4"-PL-2242-B' (cool feed to top tray V-745).

entities.name: MV-742-12
entities.description: Valve on 4"-PL-2242-B (isolation instrument/line valve). Symbol adjacent to PL-2242-B text.

entities.name: 4"-PL-2243-B
entities.description: 4" process line to NGL stabilizer (warm feed to mid tray V-745) - labelled '4"-PL-2243-B'.

entities.name: MV-742-09
entities.description: Valve on 4"-PL-2243-B (isolation/instrument valve).

entities.name: 3"-PL-2250-B-1"H
entities.description: 3" process line labelled '3"-PL-2250-B-1"H' (from stabilizer reboiler E-745).

entities.name: MV-735-11
entities.description: Valve on upper header (3"-B2R) feeding system; tag visible near top header line.

entities.name: MV-735-12
entities.description: Valve on upper header used as a bypass (tag MV-735-12 visible near top header).

entities.name: MV-746-01
entities.description: Isolation valve on AC-746 outlet vertical line (3" nominal line / B2R style symbol shown).

entities.name: MV-746-02
entities.description: Second valve on AC-746 outlet vertical run (downstream of MV-746-01).

entities.name: MV-746-03
entities.description: Small pilot/bleed valve on AC-746 side branch - labelled '1/2"-D2Z' adjacent to MV-746-03.

entities.name: MV-746-04
entities.description: Downstream valve on AC-746 small side branch (3"x2" transition visible, valve tag MV-746-04 readable).

entities.name: TY-747
entities.description: Temperature transmitter (TY-747) associated with AC-746. Located near AC-746 outlet/controls.

entities.name: TIC-747
entities.description: Temperature Indicating/Controller TIC-747 with setpoint annotation 'SET @ 100°F' (controls AC-746 temperature via VFD).

entities.name: VT-746
entities.description: Instrument labelled VT-746 (located adjacent to AC-746 motor).

entities.name: VFD
entities.description: Variable frequency drive (VFD) for AC-746 motor (label 'VFD BY OTHERS').

entities.name: Instrument Air Header (1"-IA-5048-M)
entities.description: Instrument air supply header labelled 'FROM INSTRUMENT AIR HEADER 1"-IA-5048-M' (feeds MV-746-08).

entities.name: MV-746-08
entities.description: Main 1" instrument air isolating valve on the instrument air supply branch (label shows '1"-D2S' at valve).

entities.name: MV-746-10
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve on the instrument air branch (tag MV-746-10). Shown feeding instrument TY-742 (label 'TO TY-742').

entities.name: MV-742-18
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve (tag MV-742-18). Nearby text indicates branch 'TO TY-747'.

entities.name: MV-735-15
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve (tag MV-735-15) on the instrument air manifold (branch likely 'TO TY-735').

entities.name: MV-746-09
entities.description: 1/2" instrument isolation valve (tag MV-746-09) on the instrument air manifold - shown as 'SPARE'.

entities.name: MV-735-16
entities.description: Valve on far-right instrument branch with reducer/adaptor labelled '1"x1/2" 1/2"-D2S' (tag MV-735-16).

entities.name: TY-742
entities.description: Temperature transmitter / instrument cluster associated with E-742 (left-side cluster). Label 'TO TY-742' appears on one instrument manifold branch.

entities.name: TI-744
entities.description: Temperature indicator/instrument TI-744 located on top of E-742 (top instrument pair TI/TW-744 visible).

entities.name: TW-744
entities.description: Temperature well/thermowell TW-744 (paired with TI-744 at top of E-742).

relations.description: Process flow from AC-746 (after cooler) outlet routed toward E-742 (heat recovery exchanger) as indicated by piping/arrows between the two equipment clusters.
MV-742-12 is installed on pipe 4"-PL-2242-B
MV-742-09 is installed on pipe 4"-PL-2243-B
MV-746-01 is the primary isolation valve on the AC-746 outlet vertical run.
MV-746-02 is on the AC-746 outlet vertical run downstream of MV-746-01.
MV-746-03 is a small 1/2" bleed/isolation valve on a side branch of AC-746.
MV-746-04 sits on a 3"x2" side branch from AC-746.
TY-747 temperature transmitter is instrumented on AC-746 (measures cooler temperature).
TIC-747 (set @100°F) controls AC-746 temperature (controller output to VFD).
Instrument Air Header (1"-IA-5048-M) supplies MV-746-08 (1"-D2S)
MV-746-08 (1" supply) feeds the instrument branch valve MV-746-10 (to TY-742).
MV-746-08 (1" supply) feeds the instrument branch valve MV-742-18 (labelled 'TO TY-747').
MV-746-08 (1" supply) feeds the instrument branch valve MV-735-15 (labelled 'TO TY-735').
MV-746-08 (1" supply) feeds the spare instrument valve MV-746-09.
MV-735-16 is located downstream/right of the instrument manifold fed by MV-746-08 (adaptor 1"x1/2" then 1/2"-D2S).
Instrument air line: MV-746-10 supplies instrument TY-742 (label 'TO TY-742').
TY-742 is an instrument associated with E-742 (measures exchanger parameter).
TI-744 (paired with TW-744) is instrumented on the E-742 unit (top-of-unit instruments).
TW-744 thermowell/temperature instrument paired with TI-744 on E-742.

notes: Extraction focused on major process components (AC-746, E-742) and clearly associated text (setpoints and insulation). Smaller valves/instruments were not exhaustively captured; only high-level instrumentation text clearly tied to the major components was recorded.
Temperature control note: TIC-747 has setpoint annotated 'SET @ 100° F' (controller for AC-746).

Instrument air manifold: 1" IA supply (IA-5048-M) -> MV-746-08 -> multiple 1/2" branches (MV-746-10, MV-742-18, MV-735-15, MV-746-09) feeding TY/TI instruments (labels 'TO TY-742', 'TO TY-747', 'TO TY-735' visible).
Left-side process lines: 4"-PL-2242-B and 4"-PL-2243-B feed to NGL Stabilizer (top and mid tray respectively) and each has a 1" valve (MV-742-12, MV-742-09) on the drawing.
AC-746 outlet has a vertical 3" line with valves MV-746-01 and MV-746-02; a small 1/2" pilot/bleed valve MV-746-03 and side branch valve MV-746-04.
Merged extraction: step1 major components + step2 detailed components.
